title: Lanc
content:
What font do Lancome use ?

 [‹ The Observer newspaper fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121110256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6757 "Go to previous forum topic") [Smirnoff ad face - Life Is Calling. Where are you? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121110256/http:/www.typophile.com/node/6795 "Go to next forum topic")
author: anonymous

comments.content: I think they also use something like Isonorm, a mind boggling choice at best.

Can you post a sample of what you need? I've seen stuff like   
Bell Gothic and Isonorm (indeed Karen) used on their website.
